sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Post Message to WhatsApp

Inputs:

  • From - Registered WhatsApp number in Twilio
  • To - WhatsApp number to whom the message should be sent
  • Body - Message to be posted.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" when any failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will have a failure message if the action fails to send WhatsApp message
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Send a Attachment
